welcome.title: Welcome to Blackberry Equestrian
welcome.content:
For over 20 years, Blackberry Equestrian has been Durham Region's trusted destination for exceptional horse care and training. Our full-service facility offers everything from beginner lessons to competitive show training, all in a supportive and professional environment.

Whether you're looking for a safe place to board your horse, seeking quality instruction, or searching for your next equine partner, we're here to help you achieve your equestrian goals.

features.title: Full-Service Boarding
features.description: Premium care in our modern facility with indoor arena, outdoor rings, and extensive turnout.

features.title: Professional Training
features.description: Expert training programs for horses and riders at all levels, from beginner to Grand Prix.

features.title: Quality Horses
features.description: Carefully selected horses for sale and lease, matched to your riding goals and experience.

features.title: Lesson Programs
features.description: Comprehensive instruction for all ages and abilities in hunters, jumpers, and equitation.

features.title: Show Team
features.description: Active competition program with coaching at local and rated shows throughout Ontario.

features.title: Safe Environment
features.description: Fully insured facility with experienced staff prioritizing safety and horse welfare.
